video_description:
Mobile World Congress 2011 - Barcelona, 14-17 February 2011
Demo Huawei IDEOS S7 Slim Tablet
title: Demo Huawei IDEOS S7 Slim Tablet

comments.text: ok dont be fooled this pad is not out yet in the USA this is he 207u...what's inthestore is the 205w with no phone capability.....its shows voice dialer app however does not work﻿ as a phone... upon opening the pad you will see a sim card slot , ths is blocked by a black foam like pad.  SO BEWARE
comments.author: Gerald Malcolm Dial

comments.text:
It is not a phone,﻿ but an excellent tablet. It is fast, nice screen resolution. Good price.
The batteries could last longer tho.
comments.author: Gindep Indep
